title: When they call you boosted but you're not even ranked
body:
And then proceed to get penta and do the best out of the entire team XD

Sure it was just an ARAM and thats easy to get sometimes but makes it even sadder when they are calling people boosted in that game mode. Especially since they were low enough rank to even be put with an unranked person in the first place. Kinda an insult to themselves cuz they must suck just as much as i do.

replies.body:
"boosted" in aram, rofl.

Lower-ELO aram is about the most casual, noob-filled failfest in the game, the baddies are just transitioning from "tilted" to "boosted" in preparation for S7, last season it was a mix of "garbo" and "bought account".
Yea, I am actually unranked but i literally destroy anyone with certain champs, specially the new ryze and sometimes with jax
It's the little ignorant kiddies' new catchphrase.
